backend/main.mo: Actor module defining healthcare roles, user profiles, bookings, brand info, and Stripe checkout/session logic with admin-restricted configuration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping two branding-related color update features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each major frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining OKLCH-based color tokens and dark mode variables for global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup registering all public, admin, phlebotomist, and doctor routes with QueryClient and ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLayou: Admin layout enforcing admin/lab-executive access, showing a sidebar with admin navigation and redirecting unauthorized users. Displays loading and access verification states.
frontend/src/components/doctor/DoctorLay: Doctor dashboard layout checking doctor-role access, showing role-specific navigation, and presenting an access-denied message when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, navigation links, services, and contact details with Jeevan-themed styles.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, authentication, cart, and role-based dashboard redirects. Manages login/logout and mobile menu state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with header, footer, and main content, and shows a profile setup modal for authenticated users without a profile.
frontend/src/components/phlebotomist/Phl: Phlebotomist layout with role-gated access and sidebar navigation for dashboard and collections. Redirects unauthorized users to home.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter basic profile details and submit them to the backend. Handles form validation and profile creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, reinitializing when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand-powered persistent cart store supporting item add/remove, quantity updates, and price/MRP/savings calculations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers. Includes logic to create and configure an AuthClient and restore stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines multiple React Query hooks to fetch and mutate backend data through an actor, including services, profiles, roles, and admin checks. Handles query enabling based on actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind configuration file defining Jeevan brand color variables, light/dark themes, and utility classes. Applies styling defaults for typography and global elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app by mounting the root component and wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections for mission, vision, values, and the company story using branded UI components. Includes styled content and iconography.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCRMPage.ts: Empty or placeholder admin CRM page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCustomersP: Provides customer management with search, add, edit, and deactivate features using backend queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Shows key admin metrics such as orders, users, and pending reports retrieved from dashboard stats.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays and manages all customer bookings with order details, status, and basic filtering.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPatientsPa: Manages patient records including creation, editing, deletion, and viewing related vitals.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminReportsPag: Displays mock lab reports with status badges and actions for viewing or verifying pending reports.
Fetches and lists diagnostic services with active status, categories, and descriptions, handling loading and error states.
Loads and displays system users with role-based icons, status indicators, and basic profile details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVitalsPage: Manages patient vitals with filtering, status indicators, and dialogs for adding, updating, or deleting records.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Implements a multi-step booking form with patient details, scheduling, and payment method selection, using react-hook-form and cart integration. Submits simulated bookings, clears the cart, and navigates to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart contents with item details, pricing, and actions to remove items, clear the cart, or navigate to browsing tests when empty.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows a contact section with phone, WhatsApp, email, and other communication details using styled cards.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorAnalytic: Shows doctor performance metrics such as consultations, ratings, and patients, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorAppointm: Enables doctors to view and update appointment statuses across day, week, and month views with action handlers.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorConsulta: Renders the teleconsultation interface with video controls and SOAP note tabs for entering consultation details.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorDashboar: Displays doctor dashboard stats including appointments, prescriptions, earnings, and rating with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorEarnings: Shows earnings summaries, pending payments, monthly stats, and detailed earnings data with export support.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorHelpPage: Provides help resources, quick links, and an FAQ accordion for doctor support and training.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorPatients: Lists patient records with search filtering, loading states, and detailed patient info cards.
frontend/src/pages/doctor/DoctorProfileP: Renders a doctor profile settings page with tabs for personal info, qualifications, availability, and settings using various UI components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with quick services, promotional sections, and dynamically loaded health packages with navigation support.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists user orders with filtering tabs, status indicators, and navigation to view individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/OrderTrackingPage.tsx: Tracks a specific order by showing a timeline of booking and processing steps with visual status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/phlebotomist/Phleboto: Displays a list of assigned sample collections with status badges, patient details, and navigation actions, handling loading and error states.
Shows a metrics dashboard summarizing today's sample collection counts by status, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReportsPage.tsx: Displays available test reports with metadata and provides PDF download buttons for each report.
frontend/src/pages/ServicePage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected service using route params and predefined service data.
frontend/src/pages/TestsPage.tsx: Renders a searchable diagnostic tests catalog with cart integration and prescription upload workflows.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins with custom Jeevan brand tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, themeâ€‘update requirements, state versioning, and pending feature requests.
